scripts.seed: concurrently --kill-others "cd ms-auth & npm run-script seed" "cd ms-organisasi & npm run-script seed" "cd ms-kemiskinan & npm run-script seed"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd api-gateway & npm start" "cd ms-auth & npm start" "cd ms-organisasi & npm start" "cd ms-kemiskinan & npm start"
